alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Coffee; Grundy; Warren (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 5:08PM CST until January 01 at 5:45PM CST by NWS Nashville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Nashville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Warren County in Middle Tennessee... Coffee County in Middle Tennessee... Southeastern Bedford County in Middle Tennessee... Northwestern Grundy County in Middle Tennessee... * Until 545 PM CST. * At 508 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tullahoma, or 7 miles northeast of Lynchburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Manchester, Tullahoma, Altamont, Morrison, Normandy, Viola, Hillsboro, Raus, Summitville, Arnold AFB and Woods Reservoir. This includes Interstate 24 between mile markers 107 and 125. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM CST for Middle Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 700 PM CST for Middle Tennessee.
